description:
Innovation is both threatening and enhancing our lives, careers and the way we do business. However success in a new collaborative economy will require a different mindset from what we are used to. In this course I will show how you can take control and orchestrate both high performance careers and businesses through the intelligent use of innovation and the breakthrough strategy of Synergistic Design.

Whether you are building a career or business, startup or mature, this course will provide you with a number of strategies, skills and tools for taking control and managing the threats and opportunities coming from innovation and digital disruption.

  1. Over one hour of video from ex Apple and IBM innovation specialist provides unique insight into high-performance business
  2. Learn the strategies, tools and skills innovative teams and companies use to develop breakthrough products and services
  3. Use Synergistic Design to shape your creative teams or Startup to maximise innovation
  4. View a case study on strategies for building an online education business
  5. Hear multiple examples of applying innovation to business
  6. Join in the discussions with the lecturer and other students
title: Everyone is a Business
